title: Crafting the Client: Draft and Ranked

replies.body: as usual, OCE getting fucked, once again. WHY PUT THIS LINK ON OCE?????? RITO PLS
Why wouldn't you give Normal Draft to OCE... This is like, exactly what we need!
This is so bullshit we are left out of so much.....

I think we should have this, but they have their reasons and swearing won't make it better.

Also, 'fuk' is a wimpy way to say 'fuck'.

The reason is we don't have the player bases to support normal and draft. Seems like a simple idea to just remove normal and give us draft but we are talking about riot, so who knows what they are thinking
OMG RIOT,GIVE OCE NORMAL DRAFT.PLease Riott OMG PLease.we want ITTT .
Well, thanks for making us feel like sht. Thank you rito. Thank you so much. ;-; {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} {{item:3070}}
They legit, give every server draft pick except OCE which needs it the most! Riot, you arnt doing your fans any good by not giving us Draft pick. Please for the love of god give us Draft Pick.
and they never gave us dominion, and ours was the only "region" skin that cost money
pretty sure that draven ban was a shot at tyler1 hehe XD
seriously just disable normal blind picks for OCE and enable Normal Draft pick instead. then there is no way that they can say 'not enough people play it to keep it running'

Ok, I understand that OCE is not big enough for two normal queues, then why not get rid of the toxic blind pick and replace it with the dynamic queue. Blind pick is the worst, it creates a toxic environment before the game starts, arguing in champ select and always having to scramble for the role you want. Please ditch it in favour of a draft queue.
No draft pick aside ({{item:3070}}) this actually looks really cool. The quotes make the ban phase seem like part of the game
IF U DONT PUT NORMAL DRAFT PICK ILL FARK U ALL UP RITO FLOPS
{{item:3070}} Rito plz :(
Yay, now I can solo queue and get put against a higher mmr 5 man lobby with all new champ select graphics!!!{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Because you A: have never been in that situation before and B: this is going to change that?

Get over yourself.
soooo sexy
mmh you too ;)
normal draft??? team builder is coming back?!?!?!?!?!?
Hi Rito <3

Jesus stop complaining. 
We aren't getting normal draft because there aren't enough players. The server is simply not as big as the others and would make queue times far too long for normals if either was split up.
put it on oce! we dont get pbe and now we dont get this seriously riot

> [{quoted}](name=SmoothMovees,realm=OCE,application-id=PpTM71nT,discussion-id=ha14oUVx,comment-id=0025,timestamp=2016-08-04T10:23:47.773+0000)
>
> put it on oce! we dont get pbe and now we dont get this seriously riot

Riot continuously evaluates the viability of adding Normal Draft to the queue availabilities. At this time, it would have negative effects on not only the Draft queue, but also other Normal queues.

WTF have you tossers at rito got against OCE players? We always get shafted on shit like this! You want us to pay for stuff in the game? well stop leaving us out of the game, we always get the short straw! You can't even give us a reason why we always miss out or bother to reply to the outrage of all the players that justifiably feel like they are being screwed by you, go spend some of the millions you make and update our servers to handle it if thats the problem, might as well go back to DOTA.
rekt
rito pls
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} {{champion:222}} {{summoner:7}}

Any dates on when ranked will be available on the alpha client?

Also, will the alpha testers get anything special? I think an icon would be cool. I mean i've already reported a few bugs.
Time to zip up the wallets lads, we pay so much money and get nothing in return. Rip.{{item:3070}}
{{champion:17}}
WHY NOT ON OCE?!?!!?!?!
"You used to be cool" haha nice touch. Instead of just going for quotes for bans only, it should be also for when champ selected too.
And riot WHY THE HELL DO YOU ALWAYS EXCLUDE OCEANA? WE HAVE THIS DAMN GAME FOR A REASON! WHY IS IT SO HARD TO GET IT OUT TO US AT THE SAME TIME AS EVERYONE ELSE?!
In Norms you need to have balanced wins, otherwise a bronze can play against a diamond, thats not fair dood
... "Clap Clap." Well played riot. Not giving OCE normal draft pick. Left so little, but we pay so much. Rightio, guess we miss out... AGAIN!
How about getting rid of the toxic troll afk blind picks, and put in team builder instead of it?
Remove blind pick from OCE. Blind pick isn't even how you are meant to play. Give us Draft instead. At least it would allow you to practice champion select for ranked WITHOUT doing ranked.
thats great but we want normal draft and ranked 5s back all day
Btw the video looks very cool
rito pls gib normal draft ;;
lol kk
{{champion:90}}
Get rid of blind pick and put in normal draft.
